html:
4.25.19  11:22 am   An existential question for you, Bill. If the multiverse theory is, in fact, correct, and there is a multiverse for every possibility, then theoretically there should be a multiverse where the multiverse theory is incorrect,

     might be incorrect at a certain viewing range, but you can always zoom out further. no zoom limit on this

      therefore invalidating the entire theory, correct? So, with this logic, the multiverse theory is nothing more than a paradox, right? If I'm wrong, could you shed some light onto where my flaw(s) are?

     you are underestimating the infinite nature of the verse(s)

     i didn't do it

      Regardless, the tangibility of inspiration is... inspiring. Have a favorite quote? 

     fail and fail again

4.24.19  12:52 pm   4.19.19  11:26 am How can I gain some of Bill's Skills� and start playing drums without having any?

     i learned on a drum set. i was fortunate enough to have access to a drum kit for the entirety of my childhood. but the world is wide and bright still for someone who doesn't, i think. first, get sticks. then get a pad. then get a kick pedal that works with a kick pad, and also a drum chair (throne). Also, make frequent trips to a rehearsal studio with drums already there. you can find pay by the hour places in any major city. but if you really wanna get on the hyper-speed learning bus you're gonna wanna get yourself into a band that gigs regularly. like anything. churches, weddings, church weddings, funerals, church funerals, convenient stores, convenient store funerals,

4.24.19  12:45 pm   do you think that climate change is fake/or is it real

     the whole climate is fake

4.24.19  12:38 pm   hey bill how should I play chords on piano and voice lead etc, do I go through voice leading chords in every inversion chromatically? I dont really know how I should play standards or any kind of music being a beginner at piano. im a bass player and I really hate not being able to play a chordal instrument.

     'voice lead' is not a term i know. but what you're gonna wanna do is just learn every song you know. do it on 'campfire mode'. pretend you are living in a rural area with no access to books or computers, and you are living in a community of close friends. figure out how to play songs for them, the songs you like. just learn the songs. after that you will understand everything

4.24.19  12:01 pm   one word from new snog

     and

     sure

     yes

4.24.19  11:27 am   can you reharm in your head?

     i try to harm right the first time, but sure

4.24.19  11:15 am   what chords sound "jazzy" that you use in your songs?

     it doesn't seem possible for 1 chord to sound jazzy. might be possible for an entire song to sound jazzy but even then i can't quite pin down what that means. the word jazz has morphed wildly in the last centery, as most words do

4.24.19  10:58 am   should i keep writing songs until i get a few good ones before releasing things or should i just release all my garbage as i make it

     release it privately until you think you've started getting the really good stuff, then start making it all public at a comfortable and decent pace

4.24.19  10:35 am   did you make it to the south pole in time?

     no

4.24.19  10:15 am   Hold on I'm confused. I get that maj7's are the root + third + fifth + seventh notes in a major key (at least I think), for example Cmaj7 = C E G B. But then what are the 7's?

     C7 is actually an abbreviation for 'dominant 7th' don't ask me why it's called dominant, i suspect it was popularized by a person named dominant. Or you could think of it as an abbreviation for C(b7)

      Because I know that something like C6 is the root + third + fifth + sixth, (C E G A), so then why isn't C7 C E G B?

     just a weird quirk of the history of the language. kind of like "doubt" has a silent b, or how 'invaluable' actually means valuable. oops

     Is this the same with other numbers (eg, ninths, fourths, elevenths)?

     yes but in this chord symbol language, if you just say 9 it is assumed to include the 7 also. Cmaj9 = Cmaj7(9). Cmin9 = Cmin7(9). C9 = C7(9)

     Also was does add mean? (Eg Cadd11)

     it means do it with no 7. but i think the one you mentioned might be more normally called add4

     and how does it differ from not an add (eg C11). Thanks.

     what story

     sure

4.23.19  11:13 pm   What's our of your favorite records that you would suggest I listen to right now?

     i cannot make any recommendations unless i have a much much more clear idea of who and where you are right now. otherwise all records are of absolutely the same recommendation. they all have the same inherent powers, that which the universe itself was born with

4.23.19  9:55 pm   How do you handle the notion of consumer expectation when doing something as personal as music? Or do you not handle it?

     i was able to spend an obscene amount of time developing the product outside the realm of any consumer on earth. i was so confident in where i was going that i knew it would be the right product, especially for the right consumer(s). then when the consumer(s) arrived i was already well accustomed to the strategy and there was certainly no need to change it. but i do find that i need some shades or blinds occasionally, just so i can see what i'm doing a little more clearly

4.23.19  9:35 pm   how are you so well versed on the human condition

     mostly from first hand experience

4.23.19  8:44 pm   If you had time what older songs would you want to make videos for?

     all of them

4.23.19  8:43 pm   How much has making videos influenced/changed your writing style?

     not in any way i can think of

      Has it made you try to make songs more as a combo of audio and visual, or is it still more the song first and the video whatever seems fitting?

     if it's a song it must be able to stand on its own with no video
